body:
HackerRank integrates with Eightfold to facilitate an easy and seamless candidate hiring experience. You can use Eightfold with HackerRank to screen the best tech talent.

As a part of the workflow, users can send HackerRank Tests to candidates. Test results show up directly inside the candidate's Eightfold profile.

This results in an efficient interviewing experience for the hiring team and for the candidate.

 

The Eightfold - HackerRank integration is quick to set up and get running. Admins can set it up from the Integration Settings Page.

 

Steps to set up the integration

Inside HackerRank

1. Go to the Eightfold Integration Settings Page via Settings > ATS Integrations > Eightfold

2. Generate an API Token

This API Token needs to be entered in Eightfold. Please copy and securely save this API Token for your company's account.

 

Inside Eightfold

1. Go to Admin Console > Assessment Systems

2. Add a new system

3. Select "HackerRank", an ATS System, and enter the API Key in the "Authentication Key" field.

4. Select the "Trigger Stages" that will allow a recruiter to sends a test to the candidate. The Trigger Stages are configured as a part of the ATS Integration System in Eightfold.

This is what the "Add a new System" Eightfold page should look like.

 

Once the integration is set up, recruiters can send HackerRank Tests to candidates straight from Eightfold.

Please reach out to your Eightfold point of contact for additional information and permissions inside Eightfold.
title: Eightfold - HackerRank Integration
